entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023
